title: Designing Advanced Language Education Strategies Using Generative AI

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Experience with AI Tools and Practical Experience in Language Education
context.additional_context: Training in generative AI strategies immediately applicable in the field, conducted in smartphone-centric limited-technology environments

learning_goals: Distinguish and explain the divergent/convergent learning design approaches of generative AI
Propose creative lesson design strategies utilizing generative AI in language education
Develop generative AI-based microlearning content tailored to specific learning objectives
Evaluate practical cases of generative AI tool applications applicable to real-world language education settings

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
